description.en:
Various fan comics related to Nijisanji.  
1. An adaptation of the [final fight of bracket A](https://youtu.be/3QZpEOSN9u0?t=3581) in the Nijisanji Delusional Tournament. [Author's Pixiv.](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/24372469)  
2. [Goblin Slayer's mangaka](https://twitter.com/kuroseP) depiction of the final battle in the [Nijisanji delusional tournament](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3QZpEOSN9u0)  
3. Depicts Suzuhara Lulu after her and her colleagues' concert at Zepp Namba. [Author's Twitter.](https://twitter.com/jinusi822)  
4. [Based on a conversation between Debidebi Debiru and Suzuhara Lulu.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FI_PKPuyO4Y) [[Author's Twitter.](https://twitter.com/negiyuki_fan)  
5. [Author's Twitter.](https://twitter.com/Vtuberfanart)  
6. Based on [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WCb56zgn6_g) collab. [Author's twitter](https://twitter.com/Vtuberfanart)  
7. The title refers to a line from [this song](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kyxSZovr9fY&feature=emb_logo) of theirs.  [Author's Twitter.](https://twitter.com/oribiyo)  
8. Based on a [tweet](https://twitter.com/g9v9g_mirei/status/1237300098754732032) from Gundou Mirei. [Author's Twitter.](https://twitter.com/hkcm_ksk)  
9. [Author's Twitter.](https://twitter.com/ponjiyuusu)  
11. [Source.](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/86222537) [Author's Pixiv.](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/993574)  
12. [Author's Pixiv.](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/5657960) [Author's Twitter.](https://twitter.com/misononasubi?lang=en)  
13. [Author's Pixiv.](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/5657960) [Author's Twitter.](https://twitter.com/misononasubi?lang=en)](https://twitter.com/negiyuki_fan)
